attributes.action: Reprimand publicly or dismiss any politician misusing or abusing the Green Book expenses system and the disputed expenses to repaid to the public fund.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition calls for the public reprimand and dismissal of all politicians misusing or abusing the parliamentary expenses system and for them to repay to the public fund all expenses that cannot be justified.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
